participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily enjoys quiet activities like coloring, but also has a competitive side when watching hockey.
participant_1.background: i have a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. i enjoy coloring books. i like to watch nhl hockey.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Supportive and intelligent, James prides himself on his career and his daughter's talents, while balancing family and work.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park. i am a doctor. i am now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday.
